title: New: MORLY – Seraphese
body:
This debut track from Minneapolis’s MORLY feels halfway between a stroll through an uber cool Berlin club, and a school piano recital.

Pulsating beautifully, it’s strikingly minimal, yet deeply intriguing, and as [Disco Naiveté](http://disconaivete.com/post/95477096331) points out, it really feels like the start of something.
